definition: male and female/both types (acid and alkaline, positive and negative etc)/(chemistry) amphoteric
two/both/some/a few/tael, unit of weight equal to 50 grams (modern) or 1⁄16 of a catty 斤[jin1] (old)
nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Fungizone intravenous in powder form should be stored in the refrigerator, protected against exposure to light.
sentences.chinese: 兩性黴素B粉劑應避光存於冰箱中。

sentences.english: ObjectiveTo summarize the experience of diagnosis and treatment of true hermaphroditism.
sentences.chinese: 目的總結對真兩性畸形的診斷和治療經驗。

sentences.english: Except for one of the sexes in one situation.
sentences.chinese: 而在某一情況下，兩性其中一方的選擇比較不一樣。

sentences.english: The new system is made of single amphoteric surfactant and clay stabilizer.
sentences.chinese: 該體系由單一兩性表面活性劑和黏土穩定劑組成。

sentences.english: But mating also involves plenty of competition between the sexes.
sentences.chinese: 但交配同時還涉及兩性間激烈的競爭。

sentences.english: At high external field, the polyampholyte chain is more extended.
sentences.chinese: 電場強度較高時，兩性聚離子鏈構型更爲舒展。

sentences.english: Amphotericin B liposome and itraconazole are effective in treating penicilliosis marneffei.
sentences.chinese: 兩性黴素B脂質體及伊曲康唑治療有效。

sentences.english: What were gender relationships like before colonialism ?
sentences.chinese: 在殖民政策前兩性關係是什麼樣子？

sentences.english: There were some differences in the change of fat body coefficient and genital gland coefficient of the two sexes.
sentences.chinese: 脂肪體系數和生殖腺係數的變化均表現兩性差異。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the related issues of surgical treatment of hermaphroditism in children.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討兩性畸形治療中外科干預的相關問題。

sentences.english: This may seem impossible but Atum was a bisexual god.
sentences.chinese: 這似乎不可能，但阿託姆是一個兩性神。

sentences.english: Both sexes are Brownish, with a dark gray head and neck.
sentences.chinese: 兩性體羽均爲褐色，頭和頸暗灰。

sentences.english: It is this lack of vigour which differs between the sexes.
sentences.chinese: 就是這種強烈的程度在兩性間存在不同。

sentences.english: Their new state motto is 'Live Free or Bi.'" --Jimmy Fallon
sentences.chinese: 對，他們州的新口號是“自由的活或者兩性的活。”

sentences.english: Most flowering plant species bear hermaphrodite flowers with functional stamens and carpels.
sentences.chinese: 大多數有花植物着生具有功能性雄蕊和雌蕊的兩性花。

sentences.english: " For both sexes it says, "I'm interested.
sentences.chinese: 對兩性來說，都意味着“我很感興趣。”

definition: aspect/facet/level (political, psychological, spiritual etc)/(geology) bedding plane
independent and autonomous (idiom); self-determination/to act independently/to maintain control over one's own affairs
